long_description: Designed for mountaineering, the REI Expedition Sleeping Bag features water-repellent down insulation, a waterproof/breathable shell and a double zipper system for temperature regulation. With a temperature rating of -20degF, this bag is suitable for 4-season use. Unique double zipper system allows you to adjust comfort as needed-fully close both zippers to increase warmth, open inner zipper to decrease warmth. Water-repellent 700-fill-power duck down offers superior loft and warmth. REI double-protection design combines a polymer-coated down fill with waterproof/breathable ripstop nylon all around; shell also has a durable water repellent finish. REI in-the-round design puts vertical baffles in side walls to wrap you in warmth and create a better fit than bags that use only horizontal baffles. Contoured hood, draft collar and full-length draft tubes all work to keep warmth in. Differentiated hood and neck drawcords simplify adjustments; antisnag zippers work smoothly. Pass-through pocket has zippers on the outside and the inside to provide easy access to your stashed essentials. The REI Expedition Sleeping Bag includes a nylon stuff sack and a large cotton storage bag.
